channel.title: Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [PLUS-8810] [TUGO-365] Calls & SMS traffic should go directly from gOB to gBE and from gBE to gOB
item.description:
To reduce the amount of traffic using NeoSDP in this US we will study the possibility to change calls and sms flows. The exact flows are defined in:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

  • Id 1
    • Calls and sms actions going from gBE to gOB
  • Id 4
    • Calls and sms events going from gBE to gOB

Note: The fixVersion is only for orientation, if the flow change doesn't need a change in gBE it will only need to change network nor gBE package.

Important: Call/sms actions must be directed to the correct gOB site (it's an id in the session_id), for the moment we have only 1 site working in production but we must review where the second one will be activated and what we should do in that case (maybe a proxy?, have we already one there?)
item.environment: e2e uk (connect-int) or prepro uk if the first one isn't available
item.summary: [TUGO-365] Calls & SMS traffic should go directly from gOB to gBE and from gBE to gOB

item.title: [PLUS-8336] [TUGO-365] gBE should be able to manage gOB oprov events directly
item.description:
Check gOb-NeoSDP-gBE EventNotification in:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

This events are SOAP so we must add a new endpoint in notification_server that will manage this protocol. As an example implementation it's encouraged to use https://pdihub.hi.inet/yarn/connect-pns
item.summary: [TUGO-365] gBE should be able to manage gOB oprov events directly

comments.comment: Do we need to dump wsdl on /soap/notifications/oprov?wsdl url??
Added in Test Plan file SOAP messages and their expected results.

New job for automatic testing:
http://connect-ci/jenkins/view/CD/job/component-test/7/

item.title: [PLUS-8333] [TUGO-365] gBE should be able to manage gOB UK voicemail events directly
item.description:
Check o2UK-NeoSDP-gBE Frontend Connect Notification in:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

If possible adapt current notification_server to be able to manage this rest message, they are also UNICA but we need to test it carefully.
item.summary: [TUGO-365] gBE should be able to manage gOB UK voicemail events directly

item.title: [PLUS-8402] [TUGO-365][SD] NeoSDP removal: Provide real examples about the flows that neo is managing.
item.description:
The list of flows it's defined in https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

Please prioritise to extract information about:

  • oprov actions
  • oprov notifications
  • voicemail actions
  • voicemail notifications

WSDLs site: https://colabora.tid.es/globalsdp/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?&&p_SortBehavior=1&p_FileLeafRef=UNICA%20Security%20as%20a%20Service%20Capacity&&RootFolder=%2fglobalsdp%2fShared%20Documents%2fUNICA%20APIs&PageFirstRow=1&TreeField=Folders&TreeValue=UNICA%20APIs&ProcessQStringToCAML=1&&View={7EDAE7B4-CAAB-4431-B2A4-8560E7E8F075}
item.summary: [TUGO-365][SD] NeoSDP removal: Provide real examples about the flows that neo is managing.

comments.comment: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O_wW3kLTi9S4X_nu-EWQ4aClnptqe7iRwtXeCL86-5k/edit

With alberto we have agreed to review given examples an add them in same way to the one defined in the US:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

This way we will ensure that we have all the flows covered, with a quick look, for example, we can see that there are no examples for oprov notifications (ACT001, etc. )
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AgZEjdL1iXHcdE50SnZScElkSVNWejhvLUJwbnhQN1E&usp=drive_web#gid=0

Missing:

  • Oprov notifications
    • OB0002
    • OB0003

Applications deployed on neoSDP's Tomcat servers.
Notes:

  • The schemas application is probably used, but should be tested
  • The schemas-bluevia application contains all schemas, but it is not longer used on v2.0
Maybe some flows are not implemented or working on gBE, so we must review the gBE specification to know if we need the remaining flows in the document.

New examples provided on https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AgZEjdL1iXHcdE50SnZScElkSVNWejhvLUJwbnhQN1E&usp=drive_web#gid=0

Oprov Subscriptions /OProv_Subscriptions/v1 /UNICA_SDP/OProv_Subscriptions/ServiceActivation get user service
and
Frontend Connect Notification notifications/voicemail/update /notifications/voicemail/update MarkAsUnread
are not used.
Need provisioning working on preproduction environment to capture remaining requests/responses

SOA provisioning issues are occurring since February, with no estimated date for the fix (there is another project with higher priority for UK SOA team). Could the remaining requests/responses be captured next 7th May, while upgrading neoSDP to 1.2?

Remaining requests/responses include:
ob0002 User leaves O2
ob0003 User suspends O2 services
ob0001 User's MSISDN change

So probably we need to test those events on a controlled environment.

Talked to UK people to try to launch the remaining requests on staging environment, but it looks like that testing of OB0002 and OB0003 events will result in losing the pone numbers used. Now we will see with development and gOB teams if it is possible to capture those events using alternative methods

Talked to Diego González to try to generate OB0002 & OB0003 events using curl or similar.
There are not OB0002 & OB0003 events registered on Splunk and there are doubts that those events were really implemented by UK.
Only missing deactivate service message
Captured DeactivateService message and passed to Fran
Captured the last message pending

item.title: [PLUS-8340] [TUGO-365] gBE should send oprov actions directly to UK using his SOAP interface
item.description:
gBE-NeoSDP-o2UK Oprov Subscriptions

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AvGZSzkWdxlPdDNKLTVjLXBZSVlYLTNmS1pfTW1NQ2c&usp=drive_web#gid=0

SEEN: Currently neosdp is managing the auth with the OB, they are using two way ssl cert, the idea is to manage this outside gBE, please check the feasibility.
item.summary: [TUGO-365] gBE should send oprov actions directly to UK using his SOAP interface

comments.comment: SEEN: Alberto Baselga

item.title: [PLUS-8389] [Production] TU Go Reliability Task Force
item.description:
In this US we will analyze errors detected in production.

For every reported error we must analyze de cause and user affectation with the number of affected users.

This way then we can decide together in which version we should add a fix.

Note: Add in every task as a comment the three points:

  • Cause
  • User affectation (Ex: user is not able to make originating calls)
  • Number of affected users.

NOTE: if more information is needed to proper analyse those problems we must reach SEEN team, at this moment Alberto Baselga is taking care of it.

item.title: [PLUS-8403] [DEV] NeoSDP Removal: gBE should be able to manage SOAP notifications in notification server.
item.description:
In this task we will begin to work on a SOAP solution for the notification server

As an example in TUME we had such interface, the code is:
https://pdihub.hi.inet/yarn/connect-pns

As an output of this task we will have the possibility to send SOAP traffic to a new notification_server endpoint.

Make the work in develop branch.
item.summary: [DEV] NeoSDP Removal: gBE should be able to manage SOAP notifications in notification server.

comments.comment: esto parece un duplicado de https://jirapdi.tid.es/browse/PLUS-8336 no?
https://jirapdi.tid.es/browse/PLUS-8336

item.title: [PLUS-8404] [DEV] Study soap clients
item.description:
Requirements:

  • support for two way SSL and WS-security.

The number of events that we will manage is very limited so as Iván DrSlump Montes says, be open minded, maybe a solution is to make the requests directly.

For every proposal must be provided:

  • Example implementation
  • Performance.

For performance let's together propose an scenario and a tool to share between the different tools.

TODO: check WS-Security support

item.title: [PLUS-8819] [TechDebt] Use a shared phone_normalizer function
item.description:
We are using almost the same phone_normalizer on different places:
https://pdihub.hi.inet/connect/neosdp-client/blob/develop/neosdp/client.py#L27-L30
and "connect_backend/listener/message_manager.py"

So we could 'normalize' it and move to a common place.

item.title: [PLUS-8984] If the user has no "email" in his profile, the fields in the CRM do not match the 'name' of the file
item.description:
Seen in live Arg CRM

I the user has no email, the fields in the 'user details' tab the fields do not match the field name

For example:

ID: 8c058725-8740-4020-bb17-39a2115517e8
Status: ACTIVE Act0001:Process Concluded
MSISDN: 447703299796
Username: pozo@tid.es
Email: 1.1.5
Version: CS
Priority Ringing: BOTH
SMS Routing:
item.summary: If the user has no "email" in his profile, the fields in the CRM do not match the 'name' of the file
